DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare efficacy safety variable dose Symbicort high fix maintenance dose another asthma medication , Seretide , treatment asthma .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Efficacy/Safety Symbicort® Turbuhaler® , Seretide™ Diskus™ 50/500 µg & Terbutaline Turbuhaler® 0.4 mg
DOC.mesh_term: Fluticasone Propionate , Salmeterol Xinafoate Drug Combination
DOC.criteria: Diagnosed asthma since least 6 month prior first visit Prescribed daily use glucocorticosteroids least 3 month prior first visit At least one asthma exacerbation one less twelve month prior first visit Respiratory infection affect asthma within 30 day first visit Use oral , rectal , parenteral glucocorticosteroids within 30 day first visit Any significant disease disorder may jeopardize safety patient Additional inclusion exclusion criterion evaluate Investigator .
